game.name: Slendrina Must Die The Celar
game.description:
Do you think that you have the skill to search the house and spot the 8 wonderful pieces of painting? If yes, join Slendrina Must Die The Celar and be prepared to explore the secret of Slendrina. Hey boys! You would not be allowed to leave the house, so get yourself ready to show off your fighting and escaping abilities to get the job done in this brand new action game. Try to reach to the 8 book pieces fast to score the maximum possible points in the end!

Plenty of thrill and excitement will be waiting for you in this terrifying and horrifying series of Slendrina games! It will be amazed to explore a dark cellar filled with terrors of the Slender world. Remember the creepy and dangerous minions are following the Selena and her family regularly.  They will keep crawling all around the claustrophobia-inducing corridors. When you are in the basement, make sure to uncover the dark secrets of this place in this one of the best HTML5 games for boys.

Your primary objective is to prepare your way through whatever is chasing you. Do not bother and try to focus on reaching the exit and leaving this creepy and dark place. There are four dangerous weapons including MP5, Shotgun, Gun and Knife to explore in this cool 3D zombie game. Stop your enemies in their tracks for a time since you cannot kill them completely! Good luck to reach to the 8 books timely and lift the curse of Slendrina! Have fun without download games in your PC or mobile phones!
